text:
The Future with Hannah Fry

Mathematician and author Hannah Fry investigates patterns in human behavior, AI and the creative ideas behind the organizations and pioneers transforming society. The future doesn’t just happen, we make it.
title: Trump's Tough Talk on Hedge-Fund Taxes Doesn't Match His Plan

meta_data.description: Donald Trump said “hedge fund guys are getting away with murder” when he called for ending a lucrative tax advantage for investment managers, but his published tax plan would give them an even bigger break.
